Recommendations: 1. The administration might want to own a community radio station that will be managed by the DevCom Department.
2. Additional instructional facilities and equipment may be purchased for students' use
3. A comprehensive Supervisory Program may be prepared to include the four-fold functions of the academe viz: instruction, research, extension and production.
4. A tracer study of the graduates may be done annually to determine their employability
5. A participative and collaborative activity in generating resources and income may be done among administration, faculty, staff and students.
